sfField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( SLX__Request_Status__c , "Completed") , SLX__Date_Completed__c - SLX__Date_Requested__c , TODAY() - SLX__Date_Requested__c )

sfField.summary: enter a brief description of your request, add details of request into addl info field
Please paste the URL to the record you are having an issue with. If this issue/request is not related to a Salesforce record, simply type in N/A

sfField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( SLX__Request_Status__c , "Completed") , NULL, Today()- DATEVALUE( CreatedDate ) )
